android.permission.CAMERA.description: Allows application to take pictures and videos with the camera. This allows the application to collect images that the camera is seeing at any time.

android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW.description: Allows an application to show system-alert windows. Malicious applications can take over the entire screen of the phone.

android.permission.INTERNAL_SYSTEM_WINDO.description: Allows the creation of windows that are intended to be used by the internal system user interface. Not for use by common applications.

android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

android.permission.MOUNT_UNMOUNT_FILESYS.description: Allows the application to mount and unmount file systems for removable storage.

android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER.description: Allows the application to set the system wallpaper.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

manifest_analysis.title:
Clear text traffic is Enabled For App
[android:usesCleartextTraffic=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: The app intends to use cleartext network traffic, such as cleartext HTTP, FTP stacks, DownloadManager, and MediaPlayer. The default value for apps that target API level 27 or lower is "true". Apps that target API level 28 or higher default to "false". The key reason for avoiding cleartext traffic is the lack of confidentiality, authenticity, and protections against tampering; a network attacker can eavesdrop on transmitted data and also modify it without being detected.
manifest_analysis.name: Clear text traffic is Enabled For App [android:usesCleartextTraffic=true]

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

manifest_analysis.title: Launch Mode of Activity (com.ijoysoft.gallery.activity.PhotoPreviewIntentActivity) is not standard.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity should not be having the launch mode attribute set to "singleTask/singleInstance" as it becomes root Activity and it is possible for other applications to read the contents of the calling Intent. So it is required to use the "standard" launch mode attribute when sensitive information is included in an Intent.
manifest_analysis.name: Launch Mode of Activity is not standard.

playstore_details.title: Photo Gallery - Photo Album Vault & Photo Editor
playstore_details.description:
Photo Gallery is fast, lightweight and the home for all your photos and videos, automatically organized your photo, videos, album, GIF and easy to share. Photo Gallery is designed as a smart all in one for private gallery, Gallery Vault, photo view, photo edit and photo collage maker app for managing your photo and video albums. Password-protect your photos, organize them, display them slide-show style! 
This smart gallery is your new essential picture app, Gallery Album is the best application for image & video viewing that works for Android device users.

 Automatically organized your photos & Videos
- Find your photos and videos faster with automatic organization. Fast refresh gallery collections.
- Organized your photos and videos by creating albums, setting your favorite albums
- HD browse thousands of gallery photos & Videos and use delete, copy and move to organize your gallery albums.
- Folders and SD Card support. Use folders to organize photos in any way you want. Easy to Copy and transfer your photos and videos to and from SD Cards. Create albums in any of the external SD cards.
Photo Gallery helps you stay organized, so you can spend less time managing and more time enjoying pictures, and more time sharing memories with your friends or family members.

 Gallery Lock - Hide Pictures And Videos 
Photo Gallery can easily hide and encrypt your photos and videos to keep secret to the secure Vault, keep your privacy absolutely safe. Lock seems like user can hide private photos like girl friend photos, hot photos, naughty photos, dirty photos, secret photos.
The hidden photos and videos won't be visible in the system gallery and all other apps. Only you can see the photos by entering the password. And grouped hidden photos and videos by folder whatever you want!

All-in-one Photo Editor & Photo Collage
Photo Gallery has advanced photo editing suite, such as auto-enhance which will make your photos look their best with one-tap. Use intuitive and powerful photo editing tools to apply amazing photo filters, adjust lighting, stylish stickers, text, doodle, mosaic, crop, lightening, blur and so on.
Make photo collage with Free style or Grid style. Just select several pictures, Photo Collage Maker will recreates a cool photo collage in seconds for you. Make & share collage photos on your Instagram story, Facebook, Twitter or Whatsapp..
Photo Gallery is not only a quick gallery, but also a powerful photo editor and photo collage maker. 

Features for Photo Gallery, Private Gallery , Safe Gallery, Gallery lock, Gallery Vault, HD gallery, photo editor 
- Organize your photos and videos by date, albums automatically 
- HD preview and Slideshow play photos
- Encrypt your private photos and videos, grouped by folder
- Quick search through smart category and recommend photos
- Create new albums to manage photos and videos
- Sorted by date, size, name both ascending or descending
- Keep deleted files in trash to retrieve in customized days
- Find similar photos to manage photo storage
- Stylish Stickers, Text, Doodle, Filters, Mosaic and so on
- Rich Collage template and background
- Move/Copy/Delete photos and videos 
- Rename photos or albums 
- Set wallpaper at any time
- Browse photo or video more details
- Set the wonderful photos as favorites
- Share photos to social network

More Features:
- A beautiful and simple user interface. Colorful themes and modern design, transparent layered and immersive user interface.
- Search photos or videos by date, location. Your photos are now searchable by when and where you take them.
- This is offline gallery app. Gallery works without internet connection, and is lightning fast.

Photo Gallery is an excellent, full featured Photo gallery and photo editor. It's a great galleria, photography galleries, format galleries, collection Gallery, quick photo, videos, gif & photo album app for your mobile.
